ygData.messageBody:
"intended to be read in a non-literal fashion."?
This isnt a Bible discussion.
The description of Harm Touch should match exactly what its supposed to
do. Hidden messages and open interpretation writings have no place in
instruction manuals.

And i personally dont mind how HT works now with only 1 use per
day..BUT its all-too-often failure against creatures you really need it
to work against makes it a weak "special" attack.
And it is definitely not even close to being the equal on LoH. And ,
yes, i am taking it literally that it is supposed to be its equal.
If its not equal, then our class isnt equal which means we are at a
distinct disadvantage in any PvP situation.
Then add in the rest of the Paladins spells versus ours. We're in
definite trouble.
Anything we can cast on them , if its not resisted, they can heal.
Anything they do to us, we're stuck with.

The least they could do is make our HT more plausible.
LoH heals totally... no resisted problems.
HT does only 10dmg per level, but is resisted partially or totally on a
regular basis.

If they added a lifetap funtion to this, i would have no complaints at
all, resisted issues and all.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
